I was about to get a 1k hummingbird... Glad that I got this first 10 bucks vs. 1000 Get this app
It doesn't do anything that it says it does. There is no lake depths on the maps. I wish I had my 10 back
Used in Galveston at st. Luis pass and chocolate bay, very hard to navigate some of the shallow waters, this app was spot on, and actually help us out more the my buddies 700 lowrance

What I really got it for is to track and save routes, that I take with different fishing buddies and I can say that it was worth every cent.  You really don't need gps on your boat of you have this app.  But, it's nice to have both and this one is portable and you can even save routes that a guide took you on , with out him even knowing.  Tracking routes in shallow water is very important, bc when you try to go back to a spot someone else took you, you will find out they know those waters well and make it look easy.  This is where this app comes most handy for me.

US map only has half the Great Lakes including Detroit River.  No more apparent detail than previous versions and Internet is required to download details.  No upgrade path and customer service is useless.  Old version is better but not great either.  Leaves me wishing they could get this right  maybe Lakemap can get something together.  An ipadiphone dual version would be nice since I would hate to pay twice for a bad app.  Support for older maps is horrible and upgrade offers little reward.
App is terrible it will not download any maps.  Have tried everything and there is no tech support to contact.   Just spend the money on the lake master chip
Not useful without GoTo waypoint with DTW, STW, VMG etc. The only one I found with that info is MotionX GPS

They lake that I am fishing in is not even charted on the map  It seems like that if you have a pretty small lake in general they will not be mapped. Don't waste your money of you live on a small lake, like me
the download provided nothing helpful, all it did was to suggest I buy a chart for 90, and inferred that I might need several charts. 10 wasted
Very helpful out on the water, better if you have a lifeproof case so you don't have to worry about getting your phone wet.
Really wish you could get water temps too that would be great

I started using this when they were selling separate apps for lakes  costal waters, this one combines them. These are vector charts, different from the NOAA o line charts, but this is more effective for use on electronic devices.  Works nicely on the iPhonewould love to see an upgrade for iPad and retina support.

Don't listen to the negative reviews. Works perfectly for the lakes that I fish Barkley and Kentucky. Shows creek channel and contours well and has a variety of other details such as submerged structure, buoys, and more. Worth 10 dollars easy.
Works very poor in my IPad.  Compared to the chart plotter system on my boat which is Rose Point, this is a dud program. Disappointing

You have to register an account with Navionics to make changes or add favorites to you maps, but you never receive the confirmation email from Navionics to complete the process.  If it isn't fixed, then it's 10 bucks in the lake.

I am a fisherman for inland lakes.   This is a gem of an app.  It has a high level of functionality and is as handy as your iPhone.  I find it very useful.  I use it a lot when fishing with friends in their boats.  I can mark a spot and transfer it later to my boat's GPS.  I have also used it, with the guide's permission, to record waypoints when on a guided trip.   It also works excellent when navigating to waypoints.  It gives you a current heading while under way and I have found it to be very accurate, both in recording waypoints and also finding spots.   I also feel secure having a backup to my main navigation GPS when on my boat that is potent enough to get'r done if I were to need it for something critical like finding your way out of some of the jungles in Texas lakes.   This is a HIGH value app at 10.
Works amazing best app there is for fishing and ice fishing wouldnt  have anything else
Best money ever spent use this for ice fishing all the time.

I don't have enough money for expensive hummingbird gpsdown imaging fish finder. Navonics chip over 100 by itself. This will work for now. Still use maps because the batteries don't die on them. But I don't think this was made to replace good ole maps. Just another tool to play with while trying to jaw jack the big one.

I bought this app last spring and used it for fishing on 5 or 6 lakes in N Texas.  This is a great app for the price. I used it more prior to fishing to mark spots etc.. Once on the lake, It took me right to the spot I picked out and I could also mark a spot for future reference. The only real problem I had was if you mark say a good Crappie hole on the map, everybody who has this app now knows exactly where ur spot is.  For the price, not a bad app. Use it w a depth  fish finder and it will guide u to ur location.
This is based off the less than great iPhone gps so it will be off a little but it has so many lakes and waterways in it. I use it all the time Great app

I should have read the reviews.  If I used this as planned I would hit rocks that appear on the sd version of the product.  The sd chip slides into my garmin and is wonderful.  The NOAA charts have more details then this.   Waiting for refund

I purchased this last year and used it a few time.  App was great. Found some unmarked underwater structure that wasn't showing on another product.  Since they have come out with a couple of updates.  Well I just opened the app for ice fishing only to see they took off virtually all the contour lines.  For 10 maybe this is what the app should have been, but this app now is NOT what I paid for.  I will not buy anything from navionics again because of what they did with the customers.  At the very least they should have left the app alone for all that had previously purchased it.
Absolutely love this app. Well made and easy to use. I would recommend to any boating enthusiast.
I just got the app, takes a little while to understand, but overall it's pretty good. Also, not sure really sure how accurate it is. To me it doesn't seem to be worth 10
By far the best charts of all the marine applications

After reading all of the positive reviews, I was excited about this app.  We thought it would be a more affordable option than buying a heart monitor in retail and we wanted to be able to checkin on the baby throughout the pregnancy because we had complications in the past.  Unfortunately, I never once could hear my little ones' heartbeat which was shocking considering we never had issues finding or holding onto a heartbeat in the doctors office. I tried the developer's suggestions to find a quiet room and I also tried to listen at multiple times throughout the day and it never worked.  Even at 39 weeks, I never heard a heartbeat regardless of where I positioned it.  In fact, I had a hard time even capturing my own heartbeat . I gave it two stars because it is easy to use good navigation and userfriendly and offers some good features but since I wasn't able to ever hear a heart beat it was a waste of money.  Since everyone's pregnancy is different, it could just be that I wasn't a good candidate for this type of thing...maybe it would work better for others

I was skeptical but as an extremely excited dad i felt this app would be an extra  connection to my baby for me if it worked. We tried early on at week 8 and couldnt get anything. We tried again every few weeks. After week 24 we kind of gave up until week 32. It didnt take 20 seconds and could hear it loud and clear. It was music to my ears. I give the app 5 stars bc it does everything it claims to do. It also says that you get the best results between week 3040, which was true in my case. So i say the app is worth the money cheaper than doplar, but wait till at least week 25 to try.

I have had this app downloaded since I was maybe 15 weeks pregnant. Since my placenta is in the back of my uterus, I have had no issues feeling my sweet baby boy move since 15 weeks or hearing his sweet little heart beat with this since 23 weeks. I am now 30 weeks and I can find his heart beat every day with this. Its very good and Im happy this is free because I didnt want to spend 60 on a doppler. I totally recommend this app to any pregnant woman who wants to hear their sweet bub. I would suggest waiting until around 25 weeks to make sure you can actually can pick up the heart beat, but dont be discouraged if you dont at that point. The app suggests you wait until youre between 30 and 40 weeks and I have had no difficulty finding his heart beat now that I am 30 weeks. Earlier it was a little bit difficult. Make sure you use airplane mode when youre looking for the heart beat though and that youre in a quiet room.

Counter Social is social media for people. There are no algorithms showing you what someone else wants you to see. Every post, from the owner to the newest member goes into the firehouse at the time of the post. Whether you have 1 follower or 1000 makes no difference on visibility. People are friendly. New features roll out on a regular basis. Innovation has priority. Want to join with friends for movie night? There are no ads. There is no collection of personal information collected. No trolls

The app leaves all the trolls behind, so the experience is friendly and social--the aim of social media. The layout is like the old school Tweetdeck, where you can view as many condos as you want identified by hash tag. If you become a Pro account member, you also get streams from various news outlets, access to virtual rooms, and other novelty perks from the platform creator. It is safe from troll farms from various countries known for nefarious behavior, as those countries are blocked.

I've enjoyed CoSo as my "oasis" SocMedia app, where no ads distort my viewing, trolls last about 2 minutes, and people enjoy welcoming new voices, with User advice & tips. It is a donation/subscription basis for funding: going "Pro" for $5/mo is reasonable ~ yet I donate $20 a couple times a year; Pro works on laptops or PCs, and im exclusively via phone. No ads, bots, trolls, haters; enjoy a new Millennium service!

I came over to this app a year ago after the muskrat decided to destroy the dead bird and I have had NO complaints at all! The app is easy to use, just took a week or so to retrain my brain from the doomscrolling I did on the other site, there are no algorithms so my info stays my info., and it is a great place to connect, share music, hobbies, photos, etc. Ignore ALL the magas who say otherwise, they have no idea what they're talking about! Highly recommend!

Works great for me. Had small issues on my ZFold in tablet mode, but the boss (th3j35t3r) literally discussed it in a thread with me, until he had enough info to figure out and fix the glitch. Blissfully devoid of algorithms. Real people embraced, posers move on

Absolutely LOVING CounterSocial very friendly helpful people very clear terms of service with zero tolerance for the BS , easy to learn platform where I know I'm not the product, no foreign disinformation, no ads, no bots, no trolls and actual humans on the other end. I am not a super tech person and don't know all of the details but I also noticed immediately that being on countersocial doesn't give me that "needing a hit like an addict jonesing" feeling and it's a really nice feeling!
Safe Smart Secure Friendly Folks. No trolls no bots no ads. Intermittent glitches have been caused by rapid growth from new users fleeing Twitter most have been resolved quickly.

The app itself works well and gives you access to CounterSocial on your mobile device as advertised. The app is kept simple on purpose to avoid the constant hoops Google makes devs go through. For help, all you have to do is make a post with #help and people will come running. You could not ask for a better crowd for fun, good discussion, and solace when needed. It's the social network for people that actually want to be social. No bots, no ads, trolls squashed in seconds. What's not to love?

Counter Social is a wonderful social media platform. It feels like a group of neighbors sitting on the patio, sipping iced tea, and talking, even though some of the users are in other parts of the country/world. The app works great, no obvious glitches.

Absolutely a breath of fresh air If your previous experience of short-form social media involes a tsunami of algorithm-mediated noise with blips of genuine horror, this is going to be a bit of a shock -- a steady stream of interesting chatter and a sane community that *isn't* ridden with bots. The interface takes some time to learn if you're unlearning some other site's way of doing things (though it reminds me a lot of old-school Tw**tdeck), but it is so, so, so worth it.
Great experience, no ads, smooth operation, love it

The interaction with others is mostly positive. No advertisements. A more responsible, respectful, and informative environment with a mish mash of people. No gathering of your private information for marketing like other social media apps out there.

CoSo is probably the most relaxing social media I've ever joined. The creator is heavily involved, the community is welcoming, and there are a bunch of amazing features. I've been there for 18mths now with varying degrees of activity and it's where I go to just breathe. No bots, no trolls, no spam.
No bots, enjoyable interactions! No BS!

I've had many accounts: MySpace, Facebook, Instagram, TicToc, Twitter, Mastodon...to name a few, and I've deleted every single one except CounterSocial. I've been using this app daily in conjunction with the desktop application and I love it. Other than some occasional downtime due to DoS attacks and an influx of new users the app has worked perfectly for me.

Very friendly and welcoming social media platform. Go Pro if you can. The features are great. Are there glitches at this early stage, yes. But my patience is well worth it to be on an advertisement free, bot free, troll free social media platform.

CoSo takes social media to higher level! The atmosphere there is absolutely amazing. Those complaining about the app, its not the app. The site is experiencing an influx of new users. Just a diverse, friendly, interesting community interacting having good conversations about everything.
Excellent and engaged community. App has fewer features than desktop (as one would expect on mobile) but still works very well. No ads, no algorithms, no tracking. Two thumbs up!

Very nicely designed, bug free App to keep you plugged into the best social media site on the Net. It's "drop dead easy" to use. Good enough for on the go but the best experience is on browser from a PC. Kind and helpful community, zero ads, zero algorithm silliness, and trolls/spammers get the boot in a hurry. Probably one of the best little communitys I've ever been on. The app is easy to use, sometimes a little glitchy but the creator is quick to check into it and make sure a fix is done for app stability. I don't know if folks dig a chill, laid back community, but this is one to protect at all costs.

Epic experience and space. Amazing people just like in the early days of the web before everything got ruined by trolls and jerks. Love it there.

Don't be fooled by detractors, CoSo is a great social media site filled with real people, no bots and no algorithms.

I joined CoSo recently, and downloaded the app. It's simple to use, and yet it offers very good control on your personal account settings. I love the community and how easy it is to talk and interact. There are no bots, no trolls, no flame wars. Jester has truly created a great, safe place!
This is a fun and friendly place without the annoying boost me follow lists and all the trolls.
No complaints. Easy to use. Great conversation. No bots. No trolls. No hate fueled zealots. COSo puts the "social" back in social media. What's not to love? It's a pirate's life for me.
Lovely low key app for the best place on the web

It is like an oasis in the middle of the desert. Very positive people, lots of respectful debate, no advertisements, trolls or bots (if any do sneak in, they get the splat pdq). This is not a Twitter replacement. It is not Twitter. It is infinitely better. Many features such a VR rooms, CoSoCalls, movie nights etc are great fun. So glad I found it.
I like it as an alternative to toxic twitter but have been unable to share a pic lately and the app keeps closing.
Great app, and great platform, well done Jes!
Great app, great community. Puts other social media to shame

I left the blue bird years ago and haven't really gone back to social media until someone mentioned Counter Social. This is the social media I remember from early blue bird days. I use this more than desktop, but I love the interface on both. It's clean and easy to use. and I love the experience. Everyone has interesting and fun things to share. People are welcoming, and it's good stuff. Being able to filter out things is my favorite part.

Love the app. I don't have to worry about false or misleading info since its owner removes the trash quickly. The UI is similar to tweetdeck so you are able to customize the columns. It is a very positive environment, so if you're looking for Twitter style debates and arguments it won't be for you. Jester has done an amazing job on building CoSo. If you see a negative review and it's because the person got kicked/banned, it because they tried to spread lies and/or spam people with BS.

The app does it's job of being a mobile portal to one of the best communities on the interwebs. It isn't as fully featured as the desktop experience, but it works well. "Five stars. Joe Bob says check it out" -JBB didn't say this, but might.
Counter Social is a refreshing new idea for social media. Intelligent conversation, exchange of ideas and humor. Try it!
No bots, no trolls, good place to be, respectful to others. Safe environment.

I've had CoSo for 5 months now and I love it! It's far less toxic than other social media apps, the interactive setup is user-friendly and allows you to decide whether you want to read everyone's posts or to personalize your feed, and the lack of trolling, bullying, and abusive language is refreshing. It's nice to have a social media app that's relatively drama-free and friendly instead of being constantly assaulted by negativity, hate speech, and conspiracy theories. I highly recommend it.

I've been on CounterSocial since very close to the beginning and have never had one concern about security or algorithms. People who spread misinformation, disinformation or hate are banned immediately. If you report, you get action. Really great community that is actually social. My only active social media.

Although you get all the bells and whistles on the desktop, I find that the Android app does in a trice. And, of course, the people on the site are all awesome and make the experience much more pleasurable.

The smartest social media with an intuitive experience you can tailor to your needs and wants, powered by the folks who meet there. A portal to a diverse community of clever folks with a wide span of knowledge bases and life experiences.

I really appreciate a social media app that fosters normal communication, conversation and even the occasional disagreement. You see, it IS possible to have all of that without the toxicity like you have on any other social site. No adds! NO BOTS! No (or very little) Bullsh**. Thanks J - You rock!
Intuitive surface, no problems on Android 12. Friendly community. The owner of the app personally takes care of technical issues.
Kept telling me to reset password every time I logged on. Got tiresome.
Much friendlier atmosphere than Twitter, also good music recommendations.
Social media the way it should be. No algorithms, no ads, no kidding.

Incredibly positive platform to discuss anything/everything. No ads, zero tolerance for disrespect, misinformation, trolls, and negativity aimed at other members. The ability to personalize it by adding tabs (via hashtages) to your board so you can see only posts related to that topic is a huge plus. The members are extremely friendly/helpful. I joined a few months ago, was welcomed immediately and never treated like a newbie. I wish I had found Counter Social years ago. Highly recommend.

It's a lot more civil than other social media sites I've been on. People may debate ideas, but they don't make personal insults. CounterSocial doesn't use algorithms, so there's no point in trying to make a big splash. When I first joined there was a huge influx of people, so there were some hiccups as servers were added (and other things I don't understand). Now it runs very smoothly. If you wonder about how something works, a lot of people are willing to help.

Sublime. What if there were no bots, no propaganda troll farms, no dopamine hits chasing likes? Welcome home. Leave the days of algo based outrage behind, and engage with actual humans. It will be strange at first, but you will never look back. Recommended for all users sick of what "social media" has become and want actual human connection and conversation. Did I mention no bots, no ads, no targeted marketing, and no selling any of your data to third parties?

A safe app, free of exploitation of its users because site owner/creator makes sure of this. When I found Counter Social, I knew I'd found my new home on the web. After trying pretty much everything, from Tribel to Mastodon, looking for a Twitter replacement. There are a lot of really brilliant and funny people in the CoSo community, and it is just big enough to keep you entertained but small enough to feel like home. I have never had a problem with either the phone app or the web app, except for needing to turn off ad blocker (there are no ads) to make the web app fully functional.??

The PC browser version is packed with features, but this app is missing most of them, and has many irritations. I think it's meant to be a bare-bones experience - but the fact that subscribers are allowed to use better 3rd-party apps as a paid-for benefit is a damning indictment of the experience of using this one. The platform itself is one of the safest, though extremely US-centric. Trolls, hate-speech and pornography are removed almost immediately, and it has a very welcoming culture.

Love this place! Great discussions, music, art, animals, nature, psychology, food, writing and humour that is off the charts and quality people. Excellent app and by far the best social media I've found. Want friendly interaction without the dog piling for saying the wrong word? Want social media where people are not perpetually angry or looking to be? If you have answered "yes" to any of these questions, CoSo is for you! There is an option to go pro to support the site and it is definitely worth supporting. CoSo only asks for your email and not your phone number, meaning not being easily found by real life people you want to avoid.
Very welcoming! And more importantly, I trust them with my information.

Many years using it and this is still the best mobile experience there is for Counter.Social. Beautiful look, web-like functionality. And of course CoSo is the best damn social media platform on the web.
Great platform, no algorithm, it's all pure human networking, and on desktop the features are well worth the Pro account
CoSo is great! I've been a Naut for a few years now. It's lovingly tended, and the community is wonderful. Highly recommend.

Smooth, varied customization options, great audience, hashtag support, and the desktop version is even better!!! No ads, that's the best part. This app is secure and made by a super talented team. The Pro sub is worth every penny for power users.
You meet the nicest people on CoSo. A genuinely nice social media platform.

I highly recommend this app. the only 2 things that are stopping it from being 5 star is the fact that you can't comment on posts. also it would be lovely if you could add a feature where you can go live. this app is a mix of Facebook and twitter. this is another reason why I love it. it would be nice to be able to add fiends as well as follow people but that is not a must for me. overall a great app.
CoSo is a welcome change from the "big3". Only 4 stars because i don't seem to be getting notifications through the app. Other than that,BRAVO.

While it's still a work in progress, at least my feed isn't getting crapped on with ads, trolls, or narcissist billionaires tweaking the algorithm with their fart-right garbage... the opposite of the Bird and Face apps!
Great community where trolls get the punt in hours. Easy to use, easy to manage the time line. No adds, no "for you" bs. Stay on for free or upgrade. Either way its fun and easy
This is a very thoughtful social media app. No advertising, no trolls, no nonsense. The developers are very proactive when it comes to security. The overall atmosphere here is very positive.

Counter Social is social media for people. There are no algorithms showing you what someone else wants you to see. Every post, from the owner to the newest member goes into the firehouse at the time of the post. Whether you have 1 follower or 1000 makes no difference on visibility. People are friendly. New features roll out on a regular basis. Innovation has priority. Want to join with friends for movie night? There are no ads. There is no collection of personal information collected. No trolls

The app leaves all the trolls behind, so the experience is friendly and social--the aim of social media. The layout is like the old school Tweetdeck, where you can view as many condos as you want identified by hash tag. If you become a Pro account member, you also get streams from various news outlets, access to virtual rooms, and other novelty perks from the platform creator. It is safe from troll farms from various countries known for nefarious behavior, as those countries are blocked.

I've enjoyed CoSo as my "oasis" SocMedia app, where no ads distort my viewing, trolls last about 2 minutes, and people enjoy welcoming new voices, with User advice & tips. It is a donation/subscription basis for funding: going "Pro" for $5/mo is reasonable ~ yet I donate $20 a couple times a year; Pro works on laptops or PCs, and im exclusively via phone. No ads, bots, trolls, haters; enjoy a new Millennium service!

I came over to this app a year ago after the muskrat decided to destroy the dead bird and I have had NO complaints at all! The app is easy to use, just took a week or so to retrain my brain from the doomscrolling I did on the other site, there are no algorithms so my info stays my info., and it is a great place to connect, share music, hobbies, photos, etc. Ignore ALL the magas who say otherwise, they have no idea what they're talking about! Highly recommend!

Works great for me. Had small issues on my ZFold in tablet mode, but the boss (th3j35t3r) literally discussed it in a thread with me, until he had enough info to figure out and fix the glitch. You don't get that from other SM sites! Ignore the whining from trolls who weren't welcome on the site. It's a no trolls, no bots, no ads zone, and I love that about it.
Blissfully devoid of algorithms. Real people embraced, posers move on
The best social media experience possible. This is how it's SUPPOSED to be. No bots. No trolls. Highly secure. You've arrived.
Free from bots and trolls...members are friendly and respectful. Do not go cosopro. Unable to stop payments, even after deleting my account.
The website is great but the app is neglected and leaves much to be desired. Just use the mobile website, the app doesn't really do anything special from what I can tell.

The nicest place on the internet! Unlike traditional social media, people are nice to one another. Sharing photos and music and intelligent discussions instead of anger and vitriol. No algorithm, no exploiting your data, and best of all, no Elmo Musk and his band of incels.

Counter Social is a refuge like a 5 star hotel - nice rooms, great views, beautiful gardens, lovely art, pet friendly, fabulous food, and the chef comes out of the kitchen and mingles. This app and the browser version are as smooth as finely aged whiskey. Join us.
People are amazing on this app, however, there appears to be a lot of problems with it actually loading lately, at least for me.

An incredibly positive and rewarding experience, almost a year into joining. Sincerely engaging and kind people, and trolls / aggro users are booted. Users hold each other accountable and share info about the app, including user tips. This is a platform designed for real human interaction. The system's ethics and rules are clearly designed.
Positive arena. No ads. Puts the 'Social' back in Social Media.

Great community, well made app. And the main thing - as ethical as it can be nowadays. Real respectful towards it's users. I would give 100 stars if I could
Safe, secure. Users are friendly, no bots or trolls in the several months I have been there.
5 year user. Love the app, love the community. Very easy to use. Works well with my Android phone. No ads. No bots. No asshats.

Great user experience. Once you familiarise yourself with the rules of the platform, it's a much more organic social experience than most social media. The app is straightforward and easy to navigate.
Simple to use app and wonderful community. Bullying and hateful nonsense are not tolerated. So much happier on this social media platform.

Absolutely LOVING CounterSocial very friendly helpful people very clear terms of service with zero tolerance for the BS , easy to learn platform where I know I'm not the product, no foreign disinformation, no ads, no bots, no trolls and actual humans on the other end. I am not a super tech person and don't know all of the details but I also noticed immediately that being on countersocial doesn't give me that "needing a hit like an addict jonesing" feeling and it's a really nice feeling!
Safe Smart Secure Friendly Folks. No trolls no bots no ads. Intermittent glitches have been caused by rapid growth from new users fleeing Twitter most have been resolved quickly.

The app itself works well and gives you access to CounterSocial on your mobile device as advertised. The app is kept simple on purpose to avoid the constant hoops Google makes devs go through. For help, all you have to do is make a post with #help and people will come running. You could not ask for a better crowd for fun, good discussion, and solace when needed. It's the social network for people that actually want to be social. No bots, no ads, trolls squashed in seconds. What's not to love?

Counter Social is a wonderful social media platform. It feels like a group of neighbors sitting on the patio, sipping iced tea, and talking, even though some of the users are in other parts of the country/world. The app works great, no obvious glitches.

Its similar to the blue bird app, but without all the bots and fake accounts. I moved to this site about a year ago and it is a much more positive experience without all the trolls that you find on the Bird.
Great community with absolute no space for trolling or BS.

Really grateful for the toll-free, ad-free, safe space that is CounterSocial! So much more interaction, personal control of content and a great way to find like-minded people.

Switch from Twitter has been a DREAM! Existing CoSonauts welcoming and with a user guide to help get started, #help and @CoSoTips resources, and "Ostrich Mode" to turn off sometimes confusing features for noobs, all the tools to get started and feel at home quickly. Fast growth and some DoS attacks mean a little downtime, but resolves quickly. No ads. No private info to get started. Trolls are red-carded immediately! A great experience in the face of Twexit and Elonaggedon! ??

Counter.social is what other SocMed apps fail to be - both a platform for free discussion and a bot-free, hate-free, troll-free, ad-free zone. And it's done without harvesting the user's personal information. While other SocMed apps are losing users by the thousands or demanding everything but your fingerprints, CoSo is growing at an astonishing rate. Whatever your interests, you can find kindred spirits who offer a warm welcome. I know this sounds like an ad. Really, it's not. ??
This app is full of quality content, real interactive users and less negativity. I am so glad I found it. It's my go to now.
Brilliant alternative to Twitter. Supportive friendly community. No trolls. Responsive support. Have been using since 2017 and continues to evolve. Cannot recommend enough.
Nice straight forward app. Good Twitter alternative.
Joined COSO as Twitter was driven off the deep end. Great community. Very welcoming and civil. Join and participate! App works fine for me in Galaxy 10e.

Moved from Twitter to CS. So far the transition has been good. It's super buggy I'm guessing from all the folks moving over as well. I really miss posting gifs so hopefully there will be an update soon!
Easy to use, friendly, no trolls!
Awesome app and service!! As a new user, there's a bit of a learning curve, But, otherwise, it's incredible! It's like social media on steroids.
Great people and well run platform, top notch app !
The app has more features than ?? and the service isn't hard to adapt to. I love that there are no ads, bots, fake news, etc. Very welcoming place!

I have been on Coso for a few years and have used different apps to access Coso via my android phone. I love the app Jester created and it is a streamlined version of the full browser version. Remember that at present Coso is a one man endeavour to show how Cyber communities can be. 102,000 accounts in 5 years and still growing.
It is incredible how much better things are outside of algorithmic placement and ads.

Well worth the effort. Particularly impressed by the skill and tenacity with which the owner and only tech dealt with a horrific, sustained 3-day DoS attack occurring just when there was a major influx of new people. People there are friendly and considerate and notably absent is the insidious toxicity that a lot of us fled

Absolutely a breath of fresh air If your previous experience of short-form social media involes a tsunami of algorithm-mediated noise with blips of genuine horror, this is going to be a bit of a shock -- a steady stream of interesting chatter and a sane community that *isn't* ridden with bots. The interface takes some time to learn if you're unlearning some other site's way of doing things (though it reminds me a lot of old-school Tw**tdeck), but it is so, so, so worth it.
Great experience, no ads, smooth operation, love it

Easy to use app that brings you to where people are actually willing to discuss things rather than troll you. It's had it moments the last couple of weeks due to an influx of new users but it's worth being patient

The interaction with others is mostly positive. No advertisements. A more responsible, respectful, and informative environment with a mish mash of people. No gathering of your private information for marketing like other social media apps out there.

CoSo is probably the most relaxing social media I've ever joined. The creator is heavily involved, the community is welcoming, and there are a bunch of amazing features. I've been there for 18mths now with varying degrees of activity and it's where I go to just breathe. No bots, no trolls, no spam.
No bots, enjoyable interactions! No BS!

I've had many accounts: MySpace, Facebook, Instagram, TicToc, Twitter, Mastodon...to name a few, and I've deleted every single one except CounterSocial. The best thing about it is the atmosphere, it's really a social website. I'm so thankful to be away from the vicious rhetoric, and fake news on other sites and back to civilized exchanges and varied interests. And one more positive - there are NO ads!

I've been using this app daily in conjunction with the desktop application and I love it. Other than some occasional downtime due to DoS attacks and an influx of new users the app has worked perfectly for me.

Very friendly and welcoming social media platform. Go Pro if you can. The features are great. Are there glitches at this early stage, yes. But my patience is well worth it to be on an advertisement free, bot free, troll free social media platform.

CoSo takes social media to higher level! The atmosphere there is absolutely amazing. Those complaining about the app, its not the app. The site is experiencing an influx of new users. Be patient, keep trying. Once you experience it, you will wish you had found it sooner. No hate, no bots, no arguments, no disinformation. Just a diverse, friendly, interesting community interacting having good conversations about everything.
Excellent and engaged community. App has fewer features than desktop (as one would expect on mobile) but still works very well. No ads, no algorithms, no tracking. Two thumbs up!

Loving the app. I joined earlier this year when news of the bird app purchase was first known. Great vibe and features. Jester has worked hard to counter repeated DDoS attacks and huge influxes of users which have led to down times here and there. Hope people ride out those times and give it a real chance. I think they'll like it once they get used to it. User funded with no ads.
Works great, really like the functionality and ease of use.

I absolutely love Counter Social. The community is so chill. No ads, no bots, and best of all, no more fake news. Wonderful benefits for subscription to Pro. I look forward to seeing what everyone is saying and sharing every day.
Great app and replacement for Twitter its community funded

Great place. Doesn't have the usual toxicity, anyone being abusive gets cracked down on pretty quickly. Customer service is amazing - I've not seen anything even close on other social media platforms.
Great app to migrate to since Twitter seems to have a hellscape bug. CoSo is simple to use and very reliable. Now if Elon can just back off.

Friendly bunch of CoSoNauts (brand new member welcomed 10/29/22), & actually *social* & welcoming, compared to the hostile attacking environment that birdland has become! Wasn't totally intuitive to me at first & some temp glitches because of the great migration (hence the 4 instead of 5 stars).... took a day or two to figure it out , but then a great place to be!!

Contrasocial is user supported, your privacy and safety are top priority. CoSo's staff are fantastic. The platform has no advertisers, politicians or mainstream media accounts. That alone makes it a unique and refreshing experience. It is designed to encourage user interaction and conversation.

Very nicely designed, bug free App to keep you plugged into the best social media site on the Net. It's "drop dead easy" to use. Follow multiple feeds - the Community, Friends, and your personal notifications and direct messages. You can easily block or mute users (not that you'll need to), create lists, edit your profile, and access other preferences. This App does everything you'll need.
I have been happily using CoSo for more than 5 years (before the app). Anytime I had an issue, it was fixed quickly. Good people there, trolls are not welcome. No ads, no data sharing.

Fantastic community, friendly, real people. Bots are blocked, they ban abusive people as well. Its like Twitter without fighting nonstop and harassment from sock puppet accounts. Really have to try it to see the difference. It's amazing

This is turning out to be the best social network out there today (which is always fluid of course). The app is decent with useful features and not too cluttered with unnecessary bells and whistles. The real sell is the community though. Well moderated and bot-free makes it a friendly, informative place to be.
App works great. They've been slammed with new users & a DDoS attack, but that's calming down. No ads. No bots. Trolls go splat. Good place to be.

An excellent app and social media platform/site. Developer and administrator very hands on with fixing any issues that arise with the site or app. No ads!! No algorithms! No personal data required/mined! Trolls and bots rapidly vanquished (splatted)! It's all about security, safety, and community building! Tons of extra perks available to Pro accounts via browser on the website. So much better than other social media platforms ?? People are actually kind to each other. A breath of fresh air!!

Pretty damn slick. Has a layout like TweetDeck, and while there is a learning curve, it's fantastic once you get the hang of it. With people leaving Twitter, it's been under DoS attacks, so if you experience issues, it's not the app itself.

Good enough for on the go but the best experience is on browser from a PC. Kind and helpful community, zero ads, zero algorithm silliness, and trolls/spammers get the boot in a hurry. The site and app are definitely having some growing pains with this Musk business, but it's expected and should be resolved in time. If you have problems, give it some time and try again. Spooling up capacity on a crowd-funded site isn't fast or cheap.
Best replacement for the dying bird.
Easy to navigate app love the swipe through screens and beat of all great social community awaits.
Fantastic social media app that doesn't allow bad foreign actors, trolls, or bots. That translates into a friendly, welcoming community that is fun to interact with!

Simple and ad free Android access to the one and only Counter.Social - the thinking, feeling, and creative person's social media. No bots, no trolls, no ads. No access from foreign actors spreading lies and disinfo. Motto: DBAD. ;^)
Easy to use, love it.

This is MrGoat. You won't find a better community to be a part of. Not to mention J is the most caring and enthusiastic host you'll ever meet or not meet. The TOS are pretty clear as well. Hope to see you on CoSo!
Great alternative to Twitter, the app is easy to use and stable.
No ads, no algorithms.

The best social network around, bar none. The community is amazing, there's no tolerance for hate, and the leadership actively takes steps to keep the site operational even when it's being attacked. I can't speak highly enough of CounterSocial!
App is easy to use. Those running into problems, hang in there. The site was experiencing sustained DoS attacks. The site always comes back better and faster on the other side of events like this.

1. It's not Twitter 2. Jester isn't Elon Musk 3. No racism, idiots, and a real feel good environment. Going through growing pains at present, but support is waaaay better than other social media sites.

Been on CoSo for several months now. It takes a bit of time to learn all of the features, but there's a lot of support that makes it much easier. No ads, no hate screeching, no algorithm supporting large accounts over small, plus many other positives. Sometimes it's a little glitchy due to fast growth, etc., but CoSo still gets 5 stars because it's so far superior to the Bird/other sites that exist to grab personal info for profit & promote dissention. Terrific community!
An app with a developer that cares for how the digital landscape works for the people who use it.
Wonderful social media site. No ads, trolls are almost non existent. It's everything I wished other big sites could have created before greed took over.

I've been on for over a week. I am still an active bluebird user, but the difference is easy to see. Coso is going through some growing pains, but that is to be expected. I enjoy the site and the people I've met. No ads! No abuse!
Everything good about Twitter with none of the hate & trolls. Perfect place to land post-EM doing everything he can to trash his new acquisition. #TWexit
If it had a light theme, then it would get a 5 from me.

I've been off Chief Twits app for 1 week & haven't looked back. Meeting awesome & a diverse group of thinking people. I ? that there is no tracking & they protect my data & trolls are dealt with quickly. If your looking for a fun app without the high stress & anxiety I highly recommend CoSo & NO ads is a plus ??Looking forward to the Pro option.

No ad, trolls, selling of our lives and souls and no bots. Well... Cept for Alfred our friendly companion who can usually answer questions for us. Good job J. Runs smoothly even tho punks be trying to rain on our parade

Left the blue bird and never looked back! This app is a big step up. They have been weathering a DOS attack for days with hardly a hitch. Great format, no trolls, no screaming, no name calling. Lots of great people sharing views, art, pets, music, etc. No ads, no hate. I'm home.
Amazing app. So much calmer than angry bots on Twitter. No ads, no bots, no trolls, no promotions, no spam. Love it

I love it. It's the most laid back, free of hate place I've been online. So many different folk in one place and zero tolerance for hate. There have been some growing pains with the huge influx of folks abandoning the musky bird app (myself included) and the site has been under a DoS attack. Best part is, there is no personal info to sell or hack because the only info I was asked for? My email (which I used a throwaway one because I was nervous). ??does a great job with his 1 man show.
Fantastic and welcoming community. A refreshing and cozy vibe. There are no ads nor bots - highly recommend

Awesome app for an awesome site! If you are looking for the best social media site where hate, harassment and bullying isn't allowed then this is for you. No ads, no bots, and lots of great conversation and pet pics! The site has the best customer service too. The app works wonderfully. So come check it out, you won't be disappointed. ??

Great app. Allows me to keep up with posts when I'm not on computer. The platform has had major growth over the past few days, weeks, months. Probably because it's a great platform with real people and real conversations. Open communications on updates.
I love this app! The community is great, the devs are responsive. It hits the right balance of keeping trolls at bay but allowing a lot of freedom of expression. Definitely rexommend!
CoSo is a fantastic, friendly, safe, and well-run social network with tons of advanced features.

The app works well and is intuitive enough. Features are expanding and improving. Any recent problems can be attributed to DDoS attacks and/or growing pains. CoSo is a user focused, ad-free, and security/privacy minded. ????

A fantastic app full of amazing people and the hardest working app team. J keeps the lights on while ashholes try to keep turning them off. This is the way social media is meant to be. Thank you J and friends.

The app is good for most users, and is easy enough to learn once you have an understanding of how the desktop version works. There is a little bit of a learning curve as compared to Twitter, but it's worth it. Just be patient, since there are occasional growing pains associated with their massive growth.

Straightforward app that is easy to navigate. Not quite as good as the desktop experience, but I feel that way about most apps. Please note that the recent DoS attacks on CoSo should in no way reflect on this app. Highly recommend!
Can't access app. I download and try to sign up but never receive the confirmation email so I can't really review, but I'm hoping to get some advice from the developers.
Love the app. Wish hackers would leave it alone though. DDoS attacks, not cool dudes. Hope everything keeps spinning now!

Looking for a less stressful social media application after the bird got caged and although I'll admit still learning the location of everything I haven't met one person yet that wasn't nice or willing to cut the new guy some slack definitely a good app.

Don't bother downloading this. It doesn't work.
Friendly and supportive community. Very well moderated space; can't be beaten for data privacy. No ads, no bots, no spam; no toxicity! I'm glad I signed up.

Best social media platfform out there by a mile.No bots or trolls tolerated.Smashing community to engage with.

I just downloaded this and I can't post anything. I write something and hit "post" and absolutely nothing happens. I also get a lot of bad gateway messages when trying to load another page, like my profile. Hopefully this is just a weird hiccup.

Amazing place! It's incredible the difference it makes when a platform actively blocks trolls and countries who enlist bot farms to stir up animosity and division. You can have actual conversations. Everyone has been very welcoming and accepting. There are no ads!! None! There is no hatefullness, or ignorance. It is so refreshing, like what the internet should have been all along.
App works great, site occasionally laggy but given the influx of users that's to be expected.

Probably one of the best little communitys I've ever been on. The app is easy to use, sometimes a little glitchy but the creator is quick to check into it and make sure a fix is done for app stability. Been a pro user of the site for about, oh, 8 almost 9 months now and I've ended up meeting so many wonderfully supportive and kind people in the community. I don't know if folks dig a chill, laid back community, but this is one to protect at all costs.
The app is rough, like looks like something out of 2002. Ugly and very unweildy. I get the mass of people moving from Twitter to here, but seriously this app is a trainwreck.
Why does it constantly crash? And it's sooo slooow. Gets to 99%, and then stops. So frustrating.

I enjoyed this enough to delete twitter last week, was making lots of new friends and everything was going fine, but then suddenly I've now been suspended with all my content irreversibly removed from the system, without warning and without explanation. Not sure if the suspension was intentional or part of the attack on counter social we were hearing about yesterday. Tried emailing their support but haven't heard back.
Epic experience and space. Amazing people just like in the early days of the web before everything got ruined by trolls and jerks. Love it there.
Very friendly, ad free, much more professional than Tribel ??
Don't be fooled by detractors, CoSo is a great social media site filled with real people, no bots and no algorithms.
Couldn't even sign up for the damn thing!! Tried 3 times to sign up and all 3 times it wouldn't go through. Error from website. Not worth the hassle

I joined CoSo recently, and downloaded the app. It's simple to use, and yet it offers very good control on your personal account settings. I love the community and how easy it is to talk and interact. There are no bots, no trolls, no flame wars. Jester has truly created a great, safe place!
This is a fun and friendly place without the annoying boost me follow lists and all the trolls.
No complaints. Easy to use. Great conversation. No bots. No trolls. No hate fueled zealots. COSo puts the "social" back in social media. What's not to love? It's a pirate's life for me.
Lovely low key app for the best place on the web

It is like an oasis in the middle of the desert. Very positive people, lots of respectful debate, no advertisements, trolls or bots (if any do sneak in, they get the splat pdq). This is not a Twitter replacement. It is not Twitter. It is infinitely better. Many features such a VR rooms, CoSoCalls, movie nights etc are great fun. So glad I found it.
I like it as an alternative to toxic twitter but have been unable to share a pic lately and the app keeps closing.
Great app, and great platform, well done Jes!
Great app, great community. Puts other social media to shame

I left the blue bird years ago and haven't really gone back to social media until someone mentioned Counter Social. This is the social media I remember from early blue bird days. I use this more than desktop, but I love the interface on both. It's clean and easy to use. and I love the experience. Everyone has interesting and fun things to share. People are welcoming, and it's good stuff. Being able to filter out things is my favorite part.

Love the app. I don't have to worry about false or misleading info since its owner removes the trash quickly. The UI is similar to tweetdeck so you are able to customize the columns. It is a very positive environment, so if you're looking for Twitter style debates and arguments it won't be for you. Jester has done an amazing job on building CoSo. If you see a negative review and it's because the person got kicked/banned, it because they tried to spread lies and/or spam people with BS.

The app does it's job of being a mobile portal to one of the best communities on the interwebs. It isn't as fully featured as the desktop experience, but it works well. "Five stars. Joe Bob says check it out" -JBB didn't say this, but might.
Counter Social is a refreshing new idea for social media. Intelligent conversation, exchange of ideas and humor. Try it!
No bots, no trolls, good place to be, respectful to others. Safe environment.

I've had CoSo for 5 months now and I love it! It's far less toxic than other social media apps, the interactive setup is user-friendly and allows you to decide whether you want to read everyone's posts or to personalize your feed, and the lack of trolling, bullying, and abusive language is refreshing. It's nice to have a social media app that's relatively drama-free and friendly instead of being constantly assaulted by negativity, hate speech, and conspiracy theories. I highly recommend it.

I've been on CounterSocial since very close to the beginning and have never had one concern about security or algorithms. People who spread misinformation, disinformation or hate are banned immediately. If you report, you get action. Really great community that is actually social. My only active social media.

Although you get all the bells and whistles on the desktop, I find that the Android app does in a trice. And, of course, the people on the site are all awesome and make the experience much more pleasurable.

The smartest social media with an intuitive experience you can tailor to your needs and wants, powered by the folks who meet there. A portal to a diverse community of clever folks with a wide span of knowledge bases and life experiences.

I really appreciate a social media app that fosters normal communication, conversation and even the occasional disagreement. You see, it IS possible to have all of that without the toxicity like you have on any other social site. No adds! NO BOTS! No (or very little) Bullsh**. Thanks J - You rock!
Intuitive surface, no problems on Android 12. Friendly community. The owner of the app personally takes care of technical issues.
Kept telling me to reset password every time I logged on. Got tiresome.
Much friendlier atmosphere than Twitter, also good music recommendations.
Social media the way it should be. No algorithms, no ads, no kidding.
Um .. I've opened it but the screen is completely blank. What to do? ?? Only 3 stars for now, coz I like the concept!

Incredibly positive platform to discuss anything/everything. No ads, zero tolerance for disrespect, misinformation, trolls, and negativity aimed at other members. The ability to personalize it by adding tabs (via hashtages) to your board so you can see only posts related to that topic is a huge plus. The members are extremely friendly/helpful. I joined a few months ago, was welcomed immediately and never treated like a newbie. I wish I had found Counter Social years ago. Highly recommend.

Doesn't work! After downloading and opening, I get a blank screen with a pop up saying invalid ssl certificate, then the screen says no Internet connection which isn't true. Nothing appears, nothing to interact with, no ability to seek support, can't do anything on the app at all. Shame, I was looking for a decent twitter alternative but when I can't even access the app, this ain't it...
Cannot access the app at all, keep getting told "invalid SSL certificate". Was able to access just fine yesterday.

It's a lot more civil than other social media sites I've been on. People may debate ideas, but they don't make personal insults. CounterSocial doesn't use algorithms, so there's no point in trying to make a big splash. When I first joined there was a huge influx of people, so there were some hiccups as servers were added (and other things I don't understand). Now it runs very smoothly. If you wonder about how something works, a lot of people are willing to help.

Sublime. What if there were no bots, no propaganda troll farms, no dopamine hits chasing likes? Welcome home. Leave the days of algo based outrage behind, and engage with actual humans. It will be strange at first, but you will never look back. Recommended for all users sick of what "social media" has become and want actual human connection and conversation. Did I mention no bots, no ads, no targeted marketing, and no selling any of your data to third parties?

This is a solid app that offers a great haven for those fleeing twitter. I am however removing it from my phone since the entire thing is controlled by one guy, who admittedly seems pretty cool but he defended Chris Bouzy of Bot Sentinel, a think tank predator who is well known to target progressive tweets. If the Jester thinks Chris is OK, sooner or later progressivss will be targered on Counter Social as well just like twitter youtube daily kos and on and on.

What if Twitter had no ads, all the bots and trolls were squished before you even noticed they'd arrived, and there was no algorithm manipulating what you see? And the people there weren't abusive or trying to sell OF half the time? Counter.Social is all that, and it has a much more customizable experience. Plus it has neat add-ons if u want to use them (video chats, VR rooms, etc). Only reason I go to the bird anymore is to invite friends to CoSo.

Love CoSo and am enjoying it as a great alternative to Facebook and Twitter. My only issue has been uploading videos using the mobile app. They upload to the post & disappear immediately before I can post. Push notifications would be a nice feature.
Excellent app, beautiful design, easy to navigate. 5star application
Great complement to the desktop
The place where you will get a peace of mind. Easy to use, friendly and simply amazing .
Love it! It's everything they claim and more. The most socially responsible social media app out there.

Found Counter Social almost by accident. I was a social media orphan looking for a new place to land. Downloaded the app and was met with the warmest greetings. It was like a breath of fresh air. It took me a while to decompress and was encouraged to take my time finding my way. The atmosphere is like a multi-roomed party where the topics and company in each room vary splendidly. Conversation topics are diverse and highly fluid. My only regret is not finding Counter Social sooner.

I left Twitter when Elroy decided to buy it. Counter Social satisfies my social media needs with all without all of the Musk fanatics and "patriots" decrying the non-existent threat to their free speech rights.
App works very well. Glad for it. Counter Social itself is a lot of fun and quite relaxing. I dig it.

Counter Social is a brilliant alternative to trolls and bots that run wild on Twitter. I am able to have real, meaningful conversations and people have been very welcoming. Of course, there is a bit of a learning curve as with all new social media, but the effort is well rewarded.

Just installed it today and so far I'm liking it pretty well. I do have a suggestion for developers though - closing a picture should be more responsive. Currently you have to click the "x" in the top corner, which isn't convenient for one-handed use.
No adds or algorithms. NOT right wing. People actually engage in conversation. I like it!

The people are very nice. People value productive conversation there. After 4 days of use, I saw no bots at all, there was one advertiser, that was removed within an hour. It was a prominent soft drink company with a red label. Blocking trolls is easy, and they disappear rapidly. The chats aren't troll friendly, so I only saw two of those in that time. There are a lot of politics, but there's a lot of regular convos about hobbies and interests.Highly recommend for anyone less conservative.
Not the same as Twitter but nicer, more social, bot free, musk-free, no commercial angle, all your posts get seen widely, and it's customizable to make it your own experience. Worth trying out.

The app gives access to a great community where respectful discourse is key. There are growing pains due to the rapidly expanding user base, but they are acknowledged and worked on. I have come to appreciate counter.social as a bit of a safe haven on the otherwise often toxic internet.

Really great Social Media site - you can actually connect with other humans rather than screaming into an ever more divided void. The app is still developing and new features are being added. A free account is great and fuliy featured but a pro account gives some extra features (eg movie night) and also means you are actively helping to keep the site troll n bot free and user owned. Recent influx of users led to capacity issues but now addressed. Try it - you might be pleasantly surprised.

A laid-back, low drama, refreshing alternative to social media sites designed to increase engagement through outrage. A sudden influx of customers resulted in some technical glitches, but the team kept the users informed.
App is good although more enhanced experience if you use your computer. This website is addicting. People here are great
No bots, no trolls, no ads, no hate. Yes please.

I am really enjoying the app - BUT please enable push notifications rather than email only I'm finding it difficult to keep up with my notifications and I'm missing people which makes me seem rude lol. Push notifications will increase my rating to 5*

Real people, real features, real conversations! I have been CoSo Pro for over a year. Counter.social is feature rich, the functionality is clean and slick and the app just works. Easy, intuitive, fun. I love the app almost as much as I love the community! Add to all those features and functions one of the best growing, vibrant and diverse communities on the internet, a zero tolerance for trolls policy and no ads or agendas other than what the real humans there bring to the table.

Came over from Twitter, and I'm still learning it. It's an adjustment and takes some time to stop saying to yourself, "but this is different than twitter." It is different, but imo, better for my sanity and mental health. There are no algorithms that seem to be written just to infuriate me, and everyone is simply interested in connecting. I recommend it!
Great ad-free social media alternative if you're tired of trolls and bots. The site was recently overwhelmed by a flood of Twitter refugees, but in general works very well. Highly recommended.

Hi guys I'm giving it three stars right now because, although I love the concept of it the problem is there's no way to control audio notifications nor notifications at all for different categories... other than that I really like the app, it's much more simplified than the web version, keep up the good work

Recently joined CounterSocial and everything that I have seen so far has been wonderful. This is truely the social media experience that I have been looking for. Everyone is so welcoming and even when people disagree theh are civil about it and allows space for each person to see the other's perspective. It does take a little bit to get use to things. I am still figuring some things out. But overall, I am truly enjoying the experience.
Signed up only to have the account promptly disabled. Seems far worse than existing social media we have.

The app logged me out and I forgot my password so I asked for a pw reset email. When I click the link in the email it... logs me into my account. Trying to write a post on my Android phone but it won't let me select a photo and switches to the phone home screen..... Very disappointing as the app looks promising. Works on my Windows laptop, but you tend to use a phone for this sort of thing....
Great features, wonderful community

The app itself works very well as an interface for an Android phone. Things were a bit spotty for a bit recently, but that had to do with a huge migration of new users from Twitter requiring server-side updates to support. It had nothing to do with the app itself. It's a perfectly good interface to a truly unique social network.
I'll be happy when the app actually WORKS ! So sick of Zuckerbitch and Muskrats Nazi take over!!

I am enjoying this app since I joined last week. The site has had a tremendous influx of new users since the prospect of a Musk takeover of Twitter. This caused the site to crash for a couple of days, and they had to add new servers. But it's back up and running, and everybody is very helpful. CoSo is a great community, where everyone is respectful to each other, no trolls or bots, no data mining, and tons of cool bonus features. All done by ONE PERSON! This is a wonderful social media community. People are nice, and it feels safe. The site has undergone upgrades due to a huge influx of new users, and had to be shut down for a couple days. This made a lot of new users think it didn't work, and that's where some of these negative reviews came from but it's upgraded now. Solid app with great service. It's a really interesting alternative to other social media apps. I have thoughtful and provocative interactions with people without falling into the rage trap. It was a little rocky during an upgrade but it's back now.

So far I really like this app. It's a nice mobile version of the site that works well. No idea why there are so many negative reviews over an easily explained, temporary situation.
good site with good people. they had some issues lately when their user base doubled in a few days, but when operating, there is a refreshing lack of trolls and algorithmic generated outrage

I've been on CounterSocial for over 2.5 years now, and it has worked well for me. If I experienced a problem, all I had to do was type it out there and it would be addressed within a short time. When E.M. decided to buy twitter, CS was hit with about 20,000 new users in one day, and it became apparent that we needed more space. J was on it right away. It took a couple of days, but now it's up and running smoother and faster than ever, with the features you want on social media. I can't say enough good things about the CS community. Trolls are not tolerated and the people are caring and courteous.

A refreshing take on social media, devoid of trolls and asshats running amok with senseless babbling. A lot of cool things happening here. There have been some issues since the Musk/Twitter jackassery, but that is due to the huge influx of people bailing on Twitter to join CoSo. And the developer has been working hard to get things fixed, and doing a good job of it. So be patient. And If you don't like it, then you likely ARE one of the aforementioned trolls and/or asshats.

Ignore the recent bad reviews. The mass influx of Twitter users escaping Musk crashed everything. The person who created and runs CounterSocial has worked around the clock to upgrade and the site and app are now working. I'd have thought people would realize that was the issue, waited, and tried again before coming here to post one-star reviews, especially when they were part of the influx that caused the problem!
Highly Rercommend this app! It has functions other social media apps haven't even thought of ! J, the creator of CounterSocial is amazing!!

On counter.social, you are not the product! Thoughtful, sincere, and sometimes silly conversations are the norm. You have tools to report, mute, and block trolls and the management swiftly boots those who come only to troll. It's a lovely, welcoming community of people who sometimes agree to disagree, but generally do so respectfully and with kindness. It's fully supported by users and the management. No ads, no tracking, no "engagement", no "algorithm". Give counter.social a try!

When I found Counter Social, I knew I'd found my new home on the web. After trying pretty much everything, from Tribel to Mastodon, looking for a Twitter replacement. There are a lot of really brilliant and funny people in the CoSo community, and it is just big enough to keep you entertained but small enough to feel like home. I have never had a problem with either the phone app or the web app, except for needing to turn off ad blocker (there are no ads) to make the web app fully functional.??

The PC browser version is packed with features, but this app is missing most of them, and has many irritations. I think it's meant to be a bare-bones experience - but the fact that subscribers are allowed to use better 3rd-party apps as a paid-for benefit is a damning indictment of the experience of using this one. The platform itself is one of the safest, though extremely US-centric. Trolls, hate-speech and pornography are removed almost immediately, and it has a very welcoming culture.

Mastodon is a social media platform that allows users to communicate with one another in a variety of ways. The app is free to use and is available on both Android and iOS platforms.

The progress review for Mastodon is very positive. This decentralized social network has quickly become one of the largest on the internet, with millions of users in independent communities interacting seamlessly. It has become a popular platform for users to share their passions and connect with like-minded people. The development team has done an excellent job of creating a user-friendly platform that is secure and reliable. We look forward to seeing what new features and updates Mastodon will

Simple, easy-to-use app for the Mastodon platform. One big drawback: doesn't give access to federated posts. A smaller one: you account stats (e.g. no of followers) do not update automatically but you have to click on the Edit profile button to refresh. A big plus is that it gives you access to number of favorites and boosts your posts have received. Ps. This is not the place to review Mastodon as a platform. This is where you review the *app*.
